data.title: James Franco: brother, net worth, wife, Seth Rogen, movies and TV shows
data.meta_description: JAMES FRANCO is an American actor, filmmaker, painter, and writer. Check out this article to know more about his brother, net worth, wife, movies, TV shows.
data.text:
James Franco is an American actor, director, screenwriter, film producer, artist, and poet. He is known for his roles in Eat, Pray, Love (2010), Rise of the Planet of the Apes (2011), and Spring Breakers (2008). James is also known for his collaboration with Seth Rogen, having appeared in eight films and one television series with him.

James Franco has one of the most diverse resumes in Hollywood. He won critical acclaim in breakthrough roles like James Dean and 127 Hours before gaining super-stardom status in the Spider-Man franchise and Rise of the Planet of the Apes. So what is his life outside the working environment?

James Franco profile summary

Full name: James Edward Franco

Nicknames: Ted, Teddy Ruxpin

Place of birth: Palo Alto, California

Date of birth: April 19, 1978

Age: 43 years old (as of 2021)

Nationality: American

Hometown: California

Zodiac: Aries

Ethnicity: Portuguese, Swedish, Jewish

Eye colour: Dark brown

Hair colour: Dark brown

Weight: 76 kg

Height: 5 feet 10 inches

Sexual orientation: Straight

Father: Douglas Eugene Franco

Mother: Betsy Lou

Siblings: Tom and Dave

Marital status: Single

Profession: Actor, Filmmaker, director, musician, author, teacher, producer

Net worth: $30 million

James Franco biography

James Franco was born on April 19, 1978, in Palo Alto, California. His mother (Betsy Lou) is an author and actress, while his father (Douglas Eugene Franco) ran a Silicon Valley business. Douglas is of Portuguese and Swedish ancestry, while Lou is of Russian Jewish descent.

James is the eldest son in a family of three children. His two brothers (Tom and Dave) are renowned actors. He attended Palo Alto High School and graduated in 1996. He then enrolled at the University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA) as an English major.

James Franco dropped out of school against his parents' wishes after his first year of classes to pursue his dream of being an actor. After dropping out of college, he took acting lessons at the Playhouse West with Robert Carnegie and supported himself by working at McDonald's.

Career

James Franco started to audition for various roles in the year 1997 in Los Angeles. His first paid role was in a Pizza Hut commercial. His big break was in 1999 when he was featured as the lead on the NBC show Freaks and Geeks.

James Franco's star continued to shine as he received a Golden Globe Award and nominations for an Emmy Award and Screen Actors Guild (SAG) Award. He continued to appear in hit films such as Sam Raimi's Spider-Man trilogy: Spider-Man (2002), its sequel Spider-Man 2 (2004), and Spider-Man 3 (2007). Franco credits his friend, Seth Rogen, with helping him get through the media circus and the entertainment industry at large. He even admitted to writing poems about the power of their friendship.

But are James Franco and Seth Rogen still working together? No. In an interview, Rogen stated he would no longer be working with his close friend and frequent collaborator.

Wife

Who is James Franco's wife? James is not yet married and therefore doesn't have a wife. However, he has been in several relationships. Some of the ladies he has dated before are as follows:

Amber Heard (2016)

Erin Johnson (2014 - 2017)

Emilia Clarke (2013)

Amanda Seyfried (2011 - 2012)

Agyness Deyn (2010 - 2011)

Ahna O'Reilly (2006 - 2011)

Ashley Hartman (2004 - 2005)

Marla Sokoloff (1999 - 2002)

Sienna Miller (2006)

Lindsay Lohan (2005)

Lana Del Rey (2014)

James Franco's net worth

According to Celebrity Net Worth, the actor's worth is estimated to be about $30 million. So how does he make this large figure? The star has made multiple appearances on various movies and TV shows. One of his most acclaimed projects is the film 127 Hours (2010), for which he was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Actor.

James Franco fast facts

Who is James Franco? He is an American actor, filmmaker, painter, and writer.

How old is James Franco? He is 43 years old as of 2021. He was born on April 19, 1978, in Palo Alto, California.

How many brothers does James Franco have? He has two, Tom and Dave. James Franco's brothers are actors.

How tall is James Franco? He is 5 feet 10 inches tall.

Does James Franco have a wife? No, he doesn't.

What TV shows did James Franco appear in? He appeared in several TV shows such as Alien: Covenant (2017), The Ballad of Buster Scruggs (2018), and The Mindy Project (2012â€“2017).

How much is James Franco's net worth? He has an estimated net worth of $30 million.

James Franco is a force to be reckoned with in the entertainment industry. He has landed several roles in various movies and TV shows over the years. His hard work, discipline, and consistency have seen him become one of the best in the industry.

Tuko.co.ke published an article about Sofie Dossi net worth, boyfriend, height, spine, movies, and TV shows. Sofie is an American artist, gymnast, contortionist, television personality, and YouTuber. She is well known as a finalist, and Golden Buzzer recipient on NBC's America's Got Talent.

In 2016, she appeared on America's Got Talent as a contestant and quickly won the approvals of both the judges and the audience with her routine. Eventually, she finished the competition as one of the finalists of the season.
